title: Hot deal alert! Walmart's having a fire sale on VIZIO 4K smart TVs — starting at $88
text:
The editors at Yahoo Lifestyle are committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. At times, we may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

The best deals on VIZIO 4K TVs are here! (Photo: Walmart/Yahoo Lifestyle) More

The NFL season starts this Thursday night with Green Bay facing off against Chicago. To get us ready for all the thrilling action on the gridiron, Walmart just slashed prices on dozens of VIZIO 4K TVs in various sizes.

If you’re thinking about hosting Sunday football parties, take a look at these excellent deals on HD and 4K TVs at Walmart — prices start at just $88 with this VIZIO 24-inch Class HD LED TV (D24hn-G9) for more than 30 percent off.

The big standout is this deal on the VIZIO 70-inch Class E-Series 4K Ultra HD HDR Smart LED TV (E70-F3). Right now, this humongous 4K TV is on sale for just $778, or $520 off its list price of $1,298—more than 40 percent off!

The VIZIO E70-F3 features a massive 70-inch display with a detailed and very clear 4K UHD resolution with HDR (high dynamic range support) built-in. Trust us, hard hits and high flying passes will look great on this display, thanks to its 120Hz effective refresh rate for blur-free and buttery smooth action.

In addition, this 4K model includes quite a few smart features, such as a built-in Chromecast so you can stream videos and music from your smartphone to the TV’s gigantic display. VIZIO didn’t leave Apple users out in the cold either. It comes with Apple Airplay 2, built in for seamless casting from your MacBook, Apple iPhone, or iPad, so you can stream directly from iTunes, Apple TV, or Apple Music.

Meanwhile, this 4K TV — like most models from VIZIO — also comes with access to ESPN, Fox Sports, CBS All Access, DirectTV’s NFL Sunday Ticket, and much more sports streaming out-of-the-box, so you don’t have to miss any football action this season. A truly excellent deal for $778.

Save $520 on this massive 70-inch 4K TV. (Photo: Walmart) More

Need a second and third opinion?

“I looked at all the reviews and compared the brands and models I could afford, and this TV was my pick,” wrote a satisfied Walmart reviewer. “We have had the TV for eight months and here is my review. Great picture, color, and sharpness. It was really easy to setup with streaming apps. It automatically knows when I put in a DVD and goes to the right input. Remote has buttons to go directly to Netflix, Amazon prime, and other apps. It also costs half the price of any other 70-inch TV. No repair issues, thankfully. We have had no problems and recommend to all looking for a 70-inch TV.”

“We bought this TV to downsize to match our new living room, and we were worried that the 70-inch would not be as vivid and impressive like the VIZIO 75-inch,” a Walmart reviewer wrote. “The worry was for nothing. This TV is just as great as the 75-inch, and a perfect fit, using the articulating mount we purchased at the same time. The TV looks like it's floating on the wall. We also purchased the VIZIO bluetooth sound bar and sub woofer, which is also mounted on the wall. It looks GREAT!”

Looking for more deals on VIZIO 4K and HD TVs? Check out the list below:

Shop it: VIZIO 70-inch Class E-Series 4K Ultra HD HDR Smart LED TV (E70-F3), $778 (was $1,298), walmart.com

The reviews quoted above reflect the most recent versions at the time of publication.
